# Masaic with Terra 

## Make list of rasters
```{r}
rlist <- list.files(path ="../data/DEMs/FABDEMAKYK/",pattern = ".tif$",full.names = TRUE )
```

## Define as rasters
```{r}
r <- lapply(rlist, rast)
```

## Make a spatial raster collection
```{r}

rsrc <- sprc(r)
```

##  Mosaic
```{r}
m <- mosaic(rsrc)
```


## Plot DEM

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
plot(m)
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
writeRaster(m, filename="../outputs/FieldDEM/DEMFieldSK.tif")
```
